== Panniyannur (CT) (627289) ==

Panniyannur (CT) is a town in the [[Thalassery]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 10.02 sq. km. and harbouring 4866 households with total population of 22308 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 30 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 490 km. Male population is 10047 and female population is 12261. Scheduled Caste population is 223 and Scheduled Tribes population is 37. Census Location Code of the town is 627289<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 87 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 67 km. Railway station is at Thalassery at a distance of 9 km.
